â€‹ è¿æ¥NodeMCUè‡ªå·±çš„apï¼Œssidä¸ºMicroPython-******ï¼Œpasswordä¸ºmicropythonN

â€‹ ç‚¹å‡»å·¦ä¸Šè§’connectè¿æ¥æˆåŠŸåå³å¯è¿›è¡Œç¼–è¾‘æˆ–ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶

ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾ç½®å’Œè¿æ¥wifiçš„demo

import network

def doconnect():
â€‹    wlan = network.WLAN(network.STAIF)
â€‹    wlan.active(True)
â€‹    if not wlan.isconnected():
â€‹        print('connecting to network...')
â€‹        wlan.connect('MERCURY20C2', '66668888')
â€‹        while not wlan.isconnected():
â€‹            pass
â€‹    print('connect network config:', wlan.ifconfig())
â€‹    print("Connect AP done!")

def setAP():
â€‹    ap = network.WLAN(network.APIF)
â€‹    ap.active(True)
â€‹    ap.config(essid='MicroPy', password='66668888')
â€‹    print('AP config:', ap.ifconfig())
â€‹    print('Set AP done!')

if name == 'main':
â€‹    print('Hello')
â€‹    doconnect()
â€‹    setAP()
